name: Death Tyrant
pages: A Death Tyrant is an undead Beholder that has retained some of its magical abilities, mainly the ability to summon multiple minions, and a better chance of summoning powerful daemons.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Large$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mini Boss$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Rare$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies/Hovers$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 36hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 8hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether

$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Can cast $(l:paralysis)Paralysis$() spell.$(br)- Can summon multiple undead minions at once including Zombies, Husks, Skeletons and $(l:skeleton_warrior)Skeleton Warriors$().$(br)- Has a good chance to summon a $(l:daemon)Daemon$().
